technical_learnings: Integrating mandatory emojis into the workflow provides a high-visibility signal for session closure.
Global scripts and project-specific validators need careful synchronization to avoid protocol bypasses.
Automated injection of wrap-up signals reduces agent cognitive load during the retrospective phase.
challenges_overcome: Ensuring the ğŸ validator doesn't block the implementation of the ğŸ feature itself (self-recursion).
Correcting syntax errors during multi-line edits of global Orchestrator scripts.
process_improvements: Formalize the 'Wrap-Up Signal' in the global SOP to maintain consistency across all agents.
refactoring_candidates: Move common wrap-up logic into a dedicated helper module within the Orchestrator.
